snippet.title: Virtua Fighter 4: Evolution playthrough (PS2)
snippet.description:
Playthrough with Wolf. This update to VF4 adds several new features, including 2 new characters. It also made the arcade mode a couple of stages shorter, which is great news for me, and the Wolf A.I. trick from the original still works here -just time his running clothesline right and you'll be OK.

This version was later released as a downloadble game from the PSN store. However it has a lot of issues, mainly certain stages running really slow, so if you want to play this game, play it on a PS2. I did a playthrough of the PSN version on my other channel:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t8i-ceEEMcQ
